about_the_game:
overview:

Step into the twisted world of Wonderland: Red Queen Protocol, a strategic, cyberpunk-themed collectible card game where AI, augmented reality, and ancient mysticism collide. Command iconic characters like A.L.I.C.E., the Red Queen, the Mad Hatter, and many more in turn-based battles that will challenge your wit and tactical prowess. Set in a dystopian Wonderland, where the Red Queen's AI-controlled forces wage war against rogue hacker factions, players must navigate a shattered reality, full of mystery and danger.

In Wonderland: Red Queen Protocol, players can build powerful decks, leverage unique character abilities, and master the battlefield by outwitting their opponents. With an intricate blend of cyberpunk elements and classic Wonderland lore, every card you play unravels new layers of the story as you fight for control of Wonderland's ultimate secrets.

Key Features:
    []Cyberpunk Wonderland: Explore a dystopian version of Wonderland with cybernetic warriors, AI overlords, and underground hacker factions. Familiar characters like Alice, the Cheshire Cat, and the Mad Hatter are reimagined with futuristic tech and ancient powers. []Strategic Turn-Based Card Battles: Build decks from over 100 unique cards, each with their own abilities, to craft powerful combos and strategies that exploit your opponent’s weaknesses. Deploy creatures, traps, and spells to dominate the battlefield. []Epic Storyline: Follow a gripping narrative where every card plays a role in uncovering the truth behind the Red Queen Protocol. Will you join the Red Queen’s AI army or fight for the freedom of Wonderland? []Multiple Card Types: Master various card types such as creatures, spells, traps, auras, and boosters. Each card type provides a new layer of strategic depth to your gameplay. []Iconic Characters: Play as legendary Wonderland figures reimagined as futuristic AI, hackers, and warriors. Characters like Alice, Red Queen, Cheshire Cat, and Dimentox all feature unique abilities and lore-driven cards. []Deck-Building & Customization: Craft your deck with cards from various rarities—Common, Uncommon, Rare, and Legendary. As you progress, unlock new cards to enhance your deck and refine your strategy.
detailed_description:
overview:

Step into the twisted world of Wonderland: Red Queen Protocol, a strategic, cyberpunk-themed collectible card game where AI, augmented reality, and ancient mysticism collide. Command iconic characters like A.L.I.C.E., the Red Queen, the Mad Hatter, and many more in turn-based battles that will challenge your wit and tactical prowess. Set in a dystopian Wonderland, where the Red Queen's AI-controlled forces wage war against rogue hacker factions, players must navigate a shattered reality, full of mystery and danger.

In Wonderland: Red Queen Protocol, players can build powerful decks, leverage unique character abilities, and master the battlefield by outwitting their opponents. With an intricate blend of cyberpunk elements and classic Wonderland lore, every card you play unravels new layers of the story as you fight for control of Wonderland's ultimate secrets.

Key Features:
    []Cyberpunk Wonderland: Explore a dystopian version of Wonderland with cybernetic warriors, AI overlords, and underground hacker factions. Familiar characters like Alice, the Cheshire Cat, and the Mad Hatter are reimagined with futuristic tech and ancient powers. []Strategic Turn-Based Card Battles: Build decks from over 100 unique cards, each with their own abilities, to craft powerful combos and strategies that exploit your opponent’s weaknesses. Deploy creatures, traps, and spells to dominate the battlefield. []Epic Storyline: Follow a gripping narrative where every card plays a role in uncovering the truth behind the Red Queen Protocol. Will you join the Red Queen’s AI army or fight for the freedom of Wonderland? []Multiple Card Types: Master various card types such as creatures, spells, traps, auras, and boosters. Each card type provides a new layer of strategic depth to your gameplay. []Iconic Characters: Play as legendary Wonderland figures reimagined as futuristic AI, hackers, and warriors. Characters like Alice, Red Queen, Cheshire Cat, and Dimentox all feature unique abilities and lore-driven cards. []Deck-Building & Customization: Craft your deck with cards from various rarities—Common, Uncommon, Rare, and Legendary. As you progress, unlock new cards to enhance your deck and refine your strategy.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Amd / Intel
  • Graphics: Nvidia / AMD
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Wonderland: Red Queen Protocol

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: amd or intel
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia / AMD
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Wonderland: Red Queen Protocol is a cyberpunk-themed collectible card game set in a dystopian Wonderland. Command iconic characters, build powerful decks, and engage in strategic, turn-based battles as you uncover the mysteries of the Red Queen Protocol.
